name: Generations (Dylan Gallardo)
description:
A very old project for a student assignment. It's atmospheric and has some nice use of audio and minimalist graphics.

There isn't a particular goal you're trying to achieve throughout the game. Just figure out the mechanics and enjoy yourself!

  • Use the Arrow keys to move
  • That's it, all of the other interactions are handled automatically.

The game is programmed in C++ and uses the Allegro game engine.

Mappy - The Mappy Tile Editor was used

Sounds were used from freesound.org, I'll need to compile a list of them later...

If you want to contact me, you can find me on twitter @CriticalMammal
